summary: This is an email chain between FBI and US Attorney's Office personnel discussing AT&T subscriber information for a phone number believed to be used by Ghislaine Maxwell. The subscriber is listed under 'G Max' with an address in Manchester, MA, and the financial liable party is Scott Borgerson. The email requests authorization for a pen register/trap and trace on the phone.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses a phone number believed to be used by Maxwell, with subscriber information returned to 'G Max'.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: Identified as the financial responsible party for the phone number associated with 'G Max'.

persons.name: ARossmiller
persons.context: Email recipient from the FBI, part of the discussion regarding the AT&T results.

persons.name: MComey
persons.context: Email recipient from the FBI, part of the discussion regarding the AT&T results.

persons.name: AMoe
persons.context: Email recipient from the FBI, part of the discussion regarding the AT&T results.

connections.description: Borgerson is listed as the financial liable party for a phone number believed to be used by Maxwell.

events.title: AT&T subscriber information received
events.description: FBI receives AT&T return for a phone number, with subscriber info listing 'G Max' and financial party as Scott Borgerson.

events.title: Request for pen register authorization
events.description: FBI email requests to 'go up on a pen' (pen register/trap and trace) on a phone believed to be used by Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A phone number believed to be used by Ghislaine Maxwell was subscribed under the name 'G Max' at 301 Summer Street, Manchester, MA.
Scott Borgerson was identified as the financial liable party for this phone number.
The FBI requested authorization for a pen register/trap and trace on this phone in June 2020.
The email correspondence involves coordination between the FBI and the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates ongoing investigative efforts to locate and monitor Ghislaine Maxwell prior to her arrest in July 2020.
